comments: Arithmetic mean of all n-digit odd numbers. E.g. a(2) = A.M. of {11,13,15,...97,99} = (11+99)/2 =55. - _Amarnath Murthy_, Aug 02 2005a(n) = A178632(n)/A002283(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 31 2010
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (11, -10).
formula: a(n)=10*a(n-1)+5, with a(0)=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 23 2009a(n)=a(n-1)+5*10^(n-1) with a(0)=0; Also: a(n)=11*a(n-1)-10*a(n-2) with a(0)=0, a(1)=5. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 22 2010
prog: (Maxima) A002279(n):=5*(10^n-1)/9$makelist(A002279(n),n,0,30); /* _Martin Ettl_, Nov 08 2012 */(PARI) a(n)=5*(10^n-1)/9 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 24 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
